title: The Grandsburg apartment for Sale - Colombo 07 - LKR 55,000,000
details:
The Grandsburg takes exclusivity and luxury to an all new level. Indulge and relax in the lap of luxury in the Grandsburg’s array of amazingly luxurious facilities. Grandsburg residents will delight in the convenience and easy access the apartments provide while reveling in deluxe facilities and ultra-modern amenities presented at an amazingly affordable price.

Apartment facilities:
- 3 Bedrooms
- 2 Bathrooms
- 1,358 sq.ft
- Large living and dining area
- Maid's quarters
- Pantry and kitchen
- Secure vehicle parking

Condominium facilities:
- 24 Hours Security + CCTV Camera System
- Automated Access Control
- Fully Equipped Gym
- Covered Rest Rooms and Rest Area
- Back-up Generator
- Intelligent Elevator
- Fire Protection System
- Garbage Disposal

- Integrated Intercom System
